renderReport

void renderReport(java.lang.String name, java.util.Map binding, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, java.lang.String filesubname = null, boolean isInline = true)
Renders the report, as pdf, to one http response. The pdf can be seen in browser (isInline = true) or to download (isInline = false) The filename will be: report.title + ' - ' + filesubname + '.pdf'
Parameters:
name - of the report
binding - map to pass to template
response - is the http response to write
filesubname - is additional name for the file name
isInline - true will write http headers to see the pdf in browser, false will write headers to download the pdf

renderReport

byte[] renderReport(java.lang.String name, java.util.Map binding)
Renders the report and returns the PDF bytes
Parameters:
name - of the report
binding - map to pass to template

renderReport

void renderReport(Report reportInstance, java.util.Map binding, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, java.lang.String filesubname = null, boolean isInline = false)
